Package ohos.agp.animation

Class Animator.CurveType

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.animation.Animator.CurveType
  • Enclosing class:
    Animator

    public static class Animator.CurveType
extends Object
    Provides curve types supported by the system.

    curve types include ACCELERATE, ACCELERATE_DECELERATE, ANTICIPATE, ANTICIPATE_OVERSHOOT, BOUNCE, CUBIC_HERMITE, CYCLE, DECELERATE, LINEAR, OVERSHOOT, SMOOTH_STEP, and SPRING.

    Since:
    1

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int ACCELERATE
      Indicates a curve in which the animation starts slowly and accelerates gradually.
      static int ACCELERATE_DECELERATE
      Indicates a curve in which the animation starts slowly, then accelerates through the middle, and finally decelerates.
      static int ANTICIPATE
      Indicates a curve in which the animation starts moving backwards and then swings forwards quickly.
      static int ANTICIPATE_OVERSHOOT
      Indicates a curve in which the animation starts moving backwards, then swings forwards quickly and overshoots the target, and finally returns to the target.
      static int BOUNCE
      Indicates a curve in which an animation accelerates towards the target and then bounces several times at the target.
      static int CUBIC_BEZIER_ACCELERATION
      Indicates the preset curve for animation acceleration.
      static int CUBIC_BEZIER_DECELERATION
      Indicates the preset curve for animation deceleration.
      static int CUBIC_BEZIER_EXTREME_DECELERATION
      Indicates the preset curve for extreme animation deceleration.
      static int CUBIC_BEZIER_FRICTION
      Indicates the preset curve for a friction-based animation.
      static int CUBIC_BEZIER_RHYTHM
      Indicates the preset rhythm curve.
      static int CUBIC_BEZIER_SHARP
      Indicates the preset sharp curve.
      static int CUBIC_BEZIER_SMOOTH
      Indicates the preset smooth curve.
      static int CUBIC_BEZIER_STANDARD
      Indicates the preset standard curve.
      static int CUBIC_HERMITE
      Indicates a curve in which the animation accelerates to pass the mid-point, then moves backwards, and finally accelerates to reach the target.
      static int CUSTOMIZED
      Indicates a curve defined in java instead of in native
      static int CYCLE
      Indicates a curve in which the animation repeats to move in the sinusoidal pattern at the start.
      static int DECELERATE
      Indicates a curve in which an animation starts quickly and then decelerates gradually.
      static int INVALID
      Indicates an invalid curve type.
      static int LINEAR
      Indicates a curve in which the animation moves at a constant speed in the linear pattern.
      static int OVERSHOOT
      Indicates a curve in which the animation moves forwards and overshoots the target, and then returns to the target.
      static int PHYSICAL_FLING
      Indicates the preset curve for a fling-based animation.
      static int PHYSICAL_SPRING
      Indicates the preset curve for a spring-based animation.
      static int SMOOTH_STEP
      Indicates a curve in which the animation starts slowly, then accelerates through the middle, and finally decelerates, with a speed variation smaller than that in ACCELERATE_DECELERATE throughout the process.
      static int SPRING
      Indicates a curve in which the animation reaches the target quickly and then oscillates at the target several times.

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CurveType​()

    • Method Detail

      • checkTypeValue

        public static boolean checkTypeValue​(int type)
        Checks the value of the curve type.
        Parameters:
        type - Specifies the curve type to be checked.
        Returns:
        Returns True if there is a curve matching the input value; returns False otherwise.
